Hydras:

Hydras varely could avoid the attack, but he was sligtly hit. the 
male growled and shoted 25 times more

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> The phoenix bot lifted himself above most of the shots, but some 
still
> hit, although they were only surface shots. He sent a rain of small
> light beams down on the Predacon, but also a pair of explosive 
feather
> shards aimed straight at his wings.
> 
> *****************************
> 
> OOC: Bots affected by Dread's ability should feel a deep fear and 
act
> either totally frenzied or unable to move. I'd still like to know if
> my co-council members feel this is an acceptable power or not, 
though.
> I'll reply after they give me their opinion.
>
